short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be part of AI/Robo’s Future: Just Browse, Share Data, and Get Paid.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join the future of AI and robotics by simply browsing the web. YKYR enables you to collect, control, and monetize your browsing data, contributing directly to AI development while earning rewards.

Empower innovation, shape AI, and get rewarded for your contributions—all while maintaining full data privacy and security.

Key Features:
Own Your Data: Collect and fully own your browsing data.
Monetize Your Data: Earn rewards by contributing your data to build smarter AI.
Privacy Focused: Your data is encrypted, and only you have the decryption key.
User Control: Easily manage data collection, turn it on or off anytime.
